text.text: "...By magic enthralls your mind, thy hopes shall be your demise..."
"...Hidden beneath us all lies the realm of etherean horrors..."
"...Idols! Lend us power to rule this damned lands..."
"...Let the curse linger to those who opposes..."
"...Straight from the depths, sinners pay their price..."
"...A lingering curse acts as the catalyst to all things..."
"...Cursed flames engulf not the vessel but the soul..."
"...Frozen for eternal, a touch nor a blaze lifts the curse..."
"...Frostburn, a hybrid combination of ice and fire leads to duality of suffering..."
"...It is the cycle of life and death..."
"...Undying thirst for blood, self shall become invincible..."
